mapper.select: select p.planNum, p.userId, userName, p.sDate, (to_date(p.sDate) +3) eDate, title, p.imageFileName, detailPlanNum, d.staNum, staName, nthDay from plan p join detailPlan d on p.planNum = d.planNum join station s on d.staNum = s.staNum join member2 m on m.userId = p.userId where p.userId = #{userId}
